snippet: Although the Dow Jones industrial average was nearly unchanged, it has regained more than 80 percent of its bear market slide from 2007 to early 2009.
abstract: Stocks close flat in a thinly traded session, but the Dow Jones industrial average remains near a four-year high.
lead_paragraph: Although the Dow Jones industrial average was nearly unchanged, it has regained more than 80 percent of its bear market slide from 2007 to early 2009.

headline.main: Investor Confidence Keeps Dow Near 4-Year High
headline.print_headline: Investor Confidence Keeps Dow Near 4-Year High
